com.adobe.cq.commerce.common.promotion

Class PerfectPartnerPromotionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.cq.commerce.common.promotion.PerfectPartnerPromotionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PromotionHandler
    Deprecated. 
    in 6.1 (moved to info.geometrixx.commons.impl.PerfectPartnerPromotionHandler)

    @Deprecated
public class PerfectPartnerPromotionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements PromotionHandler
    PerfectPartnerPromotionHandler applies a configured discount (percentage or absolute) on a product, if the product itself and its partner product have been added to the cart.

        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: PromotionHandler
        Apply a promotion to a cart line item. The method returns a discount PriceInfo instance or null if no discount was applied.
        Specified by:
        applyCartEntryPromotion in interface PromotionHandler
        Parameters:
        commerceSession - The commerce session containing the cart.
        promotion - The Promotion to apply.
        cartEntry - The cart line item within the session's cart.
        Returns:
        the discount amount (as a PriceInfo), or null.

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription(SlingHttpServletRequest request,
                                       CommerceSession commerceSession,
                                       Promotion promotion)
                                throws CommerceException
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: PromotionHandler
        Allows a promotion handler to define a custom, author-oriented message for a promotion.

        The info.geometrixx.commons.impl.PerfectPartnerPromotionHandler, for instance, uses this to list the qualifying pairs of products in the current cart.

        Specified by:
        getDescription in interface PromotionHandler
        Parameters:
        request - The current request (used for access-control).
        commerceSession - The current CommerceSession.
        promotion - The Promotion.
        Returns:
        a custom, author-oriented message to display.
        Throws:
        CommerceException

      • getMessages

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> getMessages(SlingHttpServletRequest request,
                                                                     CommerceSession commerceSession,
                                                                     Promotion promotion)
                                                              throws CommerceException
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: PromotionHandler
        Allows a promotion handler to define shopper-oriented messages for a promotion.

        An order-specific promotion should return a single message with a -1 key.

        A cart-entry-specific promotion should return its message(s) keyed to the cart entries they apply to.

        Specified by:
        getMessages in interface PromotionHandler
        Parameters:
        request - The current request (used for access-control).
        commerceSession - The current CommerceSession.
        promotion - The Promotion.
        Returns:
        A list of messages, either keyed to individual cart entry indexes, or keyed to the order (-1).
        Throws:
        CommerceException
